segments.text: When the abortion came out, it was when Obregón was deposed from the government and the persecution against us began.
So I, Rolando, went to Cuba.
And I stayed in Puebla, publishing my newspaper, fighting
But then Morones put all the strength of the Red Syndicates on me and that's when it all started.
And do you make visits or holidays in Mexico since you went to Texas?
¿Usted hacía vacaciones en México en estos años pasados?
I have family, I go, I stay there for a few days, and then I come back here.
But I don't get involved in politics anymore.
I have friends with all of them.
Wherever I go, I have friends, but I don't get involved anymore.
But with the condition that I don't get involved anymore.
It's a title like all of those.
Well, your life was very interesting.
Yes, but in a word, it's very difficult.
A pesar de que tengo imprenta, no puedo hacer mis memorias.
Tengo conferencias y declaraciones y trabajos y todo, sobre todo las cuestiones de los cursos, que para mí, pues, es un verdadero...
una verdadera satisfacción haber logrado que México tuviera aquí una representación como latino.
to provide you with a copy of my work.
You can send it to your address, I don't know where.
I have several conferences that I have printed, although I don't have them in print yet, but I can send you copies of what I have, of the most important articles.
Because it's very difficult to condense a work that is at least 35 or 40 years old.
But I think the main works can be used
